Container.Name: postgres
Container.Overview:
Before installation, run this on the host to create a postgres user & group: useradd -M -s /bin/bash -U -d /var/lib/postgresql postgres
After installation and before starting, run this on host to create data directory and set ownership to correct user:
mkdir -p /mnt/user/appdata/postgres/data && chown postgres:postgres "$_"
